name: Cyber City (itch) (StevieNoWonder)
description:
Set in 2083, your old employer, Dr Conner Kurt, wants to release a toxin into the air which will turn those who come into contact with it into chameleons. 

He has moved his HQ to a new location and you must find out where it is and get there to stop him. The doctor knows you are trying to stop him so he will send out his guards and drones to stop you. 

This game offers 2 weapons for your use, a laser blaster and grenades to deal with groups of enemies. You will also need to steal a ship to get to the doctors HQ, using missiles to destroy enemy ships will help you on your way.
